text: The 4th World Freestyle Skating Championships were held in Jeonju, South Korea from September 7 to September 9, 2010. ==Medallists== {| |- bgcolor="DFDFDF" | colspan="4" align="center"| Speed slalom |- ! scope=row style="text- align:left" | Junior Men | Lan Wang Heng | Yang Hsin Chiao | Alexandre Claris |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Junior Women | Clémence Guicheteau | Wang Tzu-Chien | Deng Ling |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Senior Men | Yohan Fort | Guo Fang | Kim Sung Jin |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Senior Women | Barbara Bossi | Chloé Seyrès | Christina Rotunno |- bgcolor="DFDFDF" | colspan="4" align="center"| Pair freestyle |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | | Kim Sung Jin and Kim Tae Bin | Lee Choong Goon and Do Ji Hwan | Wang Shih Yu and Wang Shen Wen |- bgcolor="DFDFDF" | colspan="4" align="center"| Freestyle Slalom « Classic » |- ! scope=row style="text- align:left" | Junior Men | | | |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Junior Women | | | |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Senior Men | Pu HaoYang | Kim Sung Jin | Guo Fang |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Senior Women | Chen Chen | Chloé Seyres | Marina Boyko |- bgcolor="DFDFDF" | colspan="4" align="center"| Freestyle Slalom « Battle » |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Men | Pu HaoYang | Kim Sung Jin | Guo Fang |- ! scope=row style="text-align:left" | Women | Marina Boyko | Polina Semenova | Chen Chen |} ==References== Category:Roller skating competitions Category:2010 in South Korean sport Category:2010 in roller sports
title: 2010 World Freestyle Skating Championships
